name: RPG Maker MZ - Fireball Projectile Pack
name_original: RPG Maker MZ - Fireball Projectile Pack
description:
Fireball Animation for RPG Maker MZ !

7 colors : Blue, Black, Yellow, Red, Orange, Purple & Green !

3 files/color: 

- Complete Animation : Plug & Play battle animation for users without plugins

- Projectile Animation & Impact Animation : For Action Sequence users ( with Projectile plugin )

You can use it commercially in your projects, but not allowed to resell the assets themselves.
